description: There’s a reason bubble tea is a trend that’s never gone out of style—it’s delicious. Boba Freeze, a unique food truck pedaling delightful drinks, has perfected the art of its “boba,” or tapioca pearls for its many flavors of bubble tea. But bubble tea isn’t all that Boba Freeze is famous for. The family behind this truck blends up the freshest ingredients to make addictive frozen smoothies in flavors like avocado, coconut, strawberry, mango, lychee, peach and watermelon. The truck bounces around Dallas, driving to its fans to deliver frosty goodness. They'll even do parties or private events—perfect for a cookout or kids’ birthday party.
name: Boba Freeze
